description: Harry Potter: Quidditch World Cup is set in the universe of J.K. Rowling's Harry Potter and features the fictional sport of Quidditch, which is characterized by the use of flying broomsticks.

name: Ame Koi
description:
Ame Koi is an erotic visual novel developed by Noesis.

It was the last title released by the brand before the departure of Coffee Kizoku, which resulting in its closure.

name: Mr. Krabs Tax Evasion
description: Play as Mr. Krabs in this Epic third person shooter. Experience a heartfelt story exploring themes of friendship, loss and gratitude all while evading the IRS.

name: Magnum Quest
description: An Imaginative IDLE RPG. Become a wise and powerful master, an amazing Hands-free adventure for you. Easy to play, Fun to win!

name: Small Soldiers
description:
Small Soldiers is a platformer based on the movie of the same name. The plot revolves around a war between two factions of toy soldiers, the Gorgonites and the the Commando Elite. The player takes the role of Archer, the leader of the Gorgonites, who has to cross five levels while facing the Commando Elite's soldiers.

The goal is simply to find the goal without dying; in one instance within a hidden time limit. However, during the first four levels Archer is completely defenseless and has to dodge the enemies. The last level introduces two new gameplay mechanics: a bow which stuns enemies and simple switch puzzles. The levels are side-scrolling, but there are junctions.

This game is unrelated to the PlayStation and PC release of the same name.

name: Ningyo no Rakuin
description: Ningyo no Rakuin is a tactical horror RPG inspired by the works of Howard Phillips Lovecraft. Between the fanatical quasi-human tribesmen, the Deep Ones rising from beneath the waves, and the grad student from Miskatonic University, there are more references to the Mythos than you can shake a shoggoth at. The plot itself is fast-paced, centering first on surviving the dangers of the island and later on rescuing the main character's girlfriend from a particularly nasty fate involving an unnamed Elder God and a transformation into a fishy abomination. Elements of the storyline play out before and after (and sometimes during) each battle, and the interludes between battle chapters include a short summary of recent events leading up to the current plot point.

name: Eternal Melody
description:
Main character is a normal high school student who gets into an accident at the construction site. Instead of dying he finds himself in a strange world. There he learns that he needs to find a powerful artifact in order to return to his world. However, there are also other contestants for the treasure as it can help to conquer the world. Will protagonist return to his world safely?

The primary objective of this game is to plan training schedules for yourself and the four members of your party, including you, to strengthen them. You must win several board game battles that occur during the journey. Additionally, by forming close bonds with the girls you recruit as allies, you can receive a confession of love from them in the ending (if you fail to build a good rapport with any party member, you will receive a confession from one of the rival characters, Kyle, Remit, or Iris). These romantic elements are secondary objectives. There are a total of 27 different endings in the game.

This game can be considered a precursor to MediaWorks' Yuukyuu Gensoukyoku Series.

description: Pandora Max Series Vol. 2: Shisha no Yobu Yakata is an Adventure Horror game developed and published by Pandora Box, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Catch! Kimochi Sensation
description: Pandora Max Series Vol. 4: Catch! Kimochi Sensation is a Dating Sim developed and published by Pandora Box, which was released in Japan in 2000

name: Gochachiru
description: Pandora Max Series Vol. 5: Gochachiru is an Adventure game developed and published by Pandora Box, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Oni Zero: Fukkatsu
description:
Long ago, during the Heian period, there was a village where humans and ghosts coexisted peacefully. Created by a ghost who wanted to end the animosity between them, it existed, isolated, for more than 250 years. One day, however, the village was attacked from the outside and completely destroyed. A young boy living in the village, Shiroumaru, and his friends, Gedoumaru and Saki, managed to escape with their lives. Now, eight years later, they are setting off together on a quest to bring peace to the land.

Oni Zero: Fukkatsu is traditional Japaneses turn-based RPG, and the last title in the series produced by series creators Pandora Box. The game follows the same formula laid out by Dragon Quest and Final Fantasy. Characters carry different elemental alignments, which affects their combat capabilities. As their abilities grow, the characters can learn special transformation attacks, and find many different spirits to aid their quest.

The game also features connectivity with other games in the Pandora Max Series. Extra unlockables are available for those who own other titles in the series.

name: The Lonely Helmet
description: In a galaxy far far away, there was a collection of helmets. Some were stronger than others, some were smaller and some were bigger, but all helmets had a purpose - to protect their space-human and allow them to breath outside of the Universe.

name: Circadia
description: Sin descripción

name: Mong Jung Mong
description: Mong Jung Mong is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame, the main goal being to explore the dream world and collect Effects. The protagonist is Lee Jin Hui, a girl refusing to leave her room.

name: The Looking Glass
description:
The Looking Glass is a Yume Nikki fangame that features spoken dialogue and flavortext when interacting with objects and characters. The game also features light adventure elements, such as simple puzzles and increased interactivity in the normal world. Unlike most fangames the player character is capable of leaving her room, and begins the game in her classroom at her school.

You play as Irene, who discovers a hidden world after falling through her mirror. The game follows her as she explores this new world after coming home from school.

name: Withers
description: Withers is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame where you play as Yakitsuki, the goal is to explore and find all the effects.

name: Yuque
description: Yuque is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. Sleeping in the bed lets you enter Nire's dream world. From there, you can explore various worlds and collect effects called Buffers.

name: Ephemreal
description: Ephemreal is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Sumitsuki and explore her dreams to collect effects.

name: If
description: If is a Yume Nikki fangame, the main objective being exploration and collecting effects. Something a bit different about If is that, instead of using the bed to enter the dream world, Shimitsuki moves her bookcase to reveal a static-like portal that she jumps into.

name: DreaMarbleng
description:
DreaMarbleng is a Yume Nikki fangame, based upon Irotsuki's dreams. As opposed to most fangames, instead of refusing to leave her room, the protagonist refuses to leave her house.

Every time Irotsuki sleeps, you earn 1 Credit as "money" of this game, which can redeem a game guide or a single-time speed boost from the desk in real world.

name: Doki-doki Pretty League Lovely Star
description: Sin descripción

name: Doki-doki on Air
description: Sin descripción

name: Doki-doki on Air 2
description: Sin descripción

name: N'Oubliez Jamais
description:
N'Oubliez Jamais is a Yume Nikki fangame, known for its unique, realistic approach to the dream system. As opposed to having a single, interconnected dream world, the player is randomly placed in a linear set of locations, the end of the dream depending on the choices of the player.

The game stars Al Ree, who, unlike many protagonists, lives in a three-room apartment with his parents and cat, and is able to exit his home.

name: Hana no Chiruramu
description: Hana no Chiruramu is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The game contains various references to Japanese culture. You play as a girl named Kodama, who is either trapped inside or refusing to leave an empty classroom.

name: Yume Tagai
description:
Yume Tagai is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The game's first act is centered around Makitsuki, a girl living in a small abandoned room who cannot leave.
Upon accomplishing a series of tasks, Sakiyuk becomes a playable character. From this point onwards, you can alternate between her and Makitsuki by waking up, with the dream world's bedroom being the main area.

name: moonLessL
description: moonLess*L is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Oborogi and Michitsuki, two girls living in an apartment. Both characters are able to leave their respective rooms and enter other rooms on the floor, as well as some on the ground floor below and in the basement, beside exploring their dreams.

name: Milky Season
description: Sin descripción

name: Endless Season
description: Sin descripción

name: Illness
description: Traditional Yume Nikki fangame, its gameplay is centered on the exploration of a Origamitsuki's dreams. It's unique characteristics are the existence of several effects on the same maps and its hallmark zoomorphic panoramas.

name: Lost Game
description:
Lost † Game is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. Unlike most Yume Nikki fangames, the main character, Sakura, is already dreaming. She seems to be trapped in a dream world full of strange creatures. The chasers, known as reapers or "death gods", can harm Sakura directly.

Outside of minimal dialogue, Lost † Game is unique in its use of a Game Over system upon being captured by a chaser or otherwise trapped. To compensate for this, the player can save at any time from the menu. To reach the ending, all thirteen Symbols must be collected and placed in the coffins seen at the start of the game.

name: Miso Nikki
description:
Miso Nikki is a Japanese Yume Nikki Fangame developed by an anonymous 2ch member, referencing a meme on the site.

You play as Misotsuki and the goal is to collect 6 Miso (orbs) along with effects to see the ending. In this game, effects cannot be held in the inventory and are therefore collected one at a time.

name: Witoru
description:
Witoru / Neta Dream is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Yon Goh and seems to be a parody of other Yume Nikki fangames. It is one of the the first fangames to have a male protagonist, as well as one of the first to feature dialogue.

It is slightly different than most fangames but it still heavily focuses on exploration and collecting Effects, as well as containing puzzles and battles. In addition, there is an option to buy items, with some being consumables that increase stats and others which are essential for progressing the game.

name: Saigo no Uta
description:
Saigo no Uta is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The player starts as a girl named Kuroyuri and can travel to her dream world by sleeping in the bed. The goal is to explore and find effects.

After the player has achieved the "Game Over" ending, the game will switch to Ciste, a girl who appears in Kuroyuri's dream. Ciste's segment is similar to Kuroyuri's in that the player must enter the dream world and collects effects. In the dream room, there is a radio that allows the player to listen the game's BGM.

name: De I Cide
description:
De I Cide is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. This game features mostly dark and disturbing themes and has a rather unusual soundtrack, consisting of metal and trance tracks in contrast to calm piano music. It stars a girl with messy hair named Inahoozuki and a silver haired child named Ginmokusei.

Like most traditional fangames, the objective is to explore dream worlds and collect effects. There are six endings to find, three for each character.

name: StreamInk
description: StreamInk is a tool that allows you to play conversational adventures in your Twitch Streams. Your viewers can vote and decide how the story progresses.

name: Cyberwar
description: Cyberwar is a DOS game based on the film The Lawnmower Man and a direct sequel to the video game adaptation of the film, which itself takes place after the film. It was released in 1994 by SCi. Ports were announced for the Sega CD, 3DO Interactive Multiplayer, and in Japan only for the Sega Saturn and Sony PlayStation, but only the Japan-only PlayStation version was released.

name: Plant vs Undead
description:
Grow your NFT Plants to defend your Mother Tree against fearsome Undead
Farming to earn more real PVU.

name: Chou Hatsumei Boy Kanipan: Hirameki Wonderland
description: Sin descripción

name: Let Me Die inside
description: The characters of Let Me Die (inside) have fallen into despair head over heels, so they want to leave this world and end their lives. Your duty is to fulfil their wish. In every level, the player is expected to find a way to die, but before that, he has to complete the death wishes of the character.

name: Tag Royale
description: A classic game of Tag with a battle royale twist. Everyone is your friend until they are IT. I hope you enjoy the views but be worried about those who are around you. They may betray you while using a power-up that can tag you and eliminate you from the game

name: Mini Island: Autumn
description: Mini Island: Autumn is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

name: Night Darkness
description: You have to take control of one of the most famous mercenaries and complete a special mission to save humanity from certain death.

name: Eyeballs are your Enemies!
description: Don't let The RulerEye establish his new reign of terror! Eliminate all eyes, collect the rewards and achieve new records!

name: You Must
description: In the social network, the main character plays the quest "Hide and Seek", but this time the organizers decided to move the quest to the real world. They indicate the coordinates of the place where the quest item was hidden, the one who finds it first will receive a cash prize.

name: Unnatural Freaks: Episode 1 Wolf At Evergreen
description: A supernatural-mystery, interactive-narrative VR experience. Are the rumours of a werewolf sighting true? Talk with townspeople and explore the museum to discover what's truly happening in the small town of Evergreen.

name: Verdict
description: Establish your written character in a world of many. Craft, fight, and befriend your way to the top against real players, all of which have their own goals and their own motives. Become the leader of a country- slay titans- create new magic- and more.

name: Towers Inc.
description: Build and manage your own corporate tower in this minimalist take on the tower building genre. Satisfy the needs of renters and keep them happy by adding services and utilities while balancing finances. Build and manage your tower the way you want to.

name: Airplane Tycoon
description: Manage your own air company! Be a businessman in the air industry, with control over everything in your business. Work, earn, grow and become an air transport tycoon!

name: Wild West Rogue
description: Wild West Rogue is a Top Down shooter game in which you need to shoot back from enemies, dodge traps, flying projectiles, look for ways out of intricate mazes and pump up your skills with the help of ancient power.

name: Neondrops
description: Turn your mice and keyboards into independent midi controllers or synthesizers. Use virtual ports to send MIDI to your DAW or plug in your own MIDI keyboard. Sampling functionality included.

name: Ball Bounce Maze
description: Ball Bounce Maze is a randomized physics-based puzzle game in which you make the ball bounce around until it hits the target without hitting the obstacles, walls, ceiling, or floor. Easy? No! With different scoring categories, you can spend all night trying to get a new best score.

name: Dice of Knights
description: Roll the dice, swing the sword and let the magic talk!

name: Tower Stacker
description: Build a huge tower! how far can you go? Try not to miss, and build the highest building in the city!

name: Yarn
description: In Yarn you play as a kitty, While playing with a special purple yarn ball, the kitty knocks it out into the world and sets out to recover it.

name: A Princess of Fallen Kingdom
description: 王国遭偷袭而隕落，勇士與青梅竹馬的公主被迫賣身淪落為奴隸，一夜之間一無所有。二人為了贖回自由身而在流放地努力工作，在冒险中互相救贖，同時也漸漸地揭開了事件真相的面紗……

name: Chicken Defender
description: Test your skills in this 2.5D, low-poly tower defense game. Your objective is to protect a chicken coop from the attacks of the cunning foxes using different items and power-ups. The possibility of modifying your approach before each wave leads to the existence of multiple winning strategies.

name: Eternal Warfare
description: Eternal Warfare is a turn-based strategy and war game where you harvest resources, build an army, and then destroy your opponents! Starting with a single building, construct production facilities, advance your tech level, and then fight through land, sea and air, until you emerge victorious!

name: Three Kingdom: The Journey
description: Three Kingdom: The Journey is an deck build roguelike game, fight to the end or journey back are all on your choices.

name: Deathly Stillness
description: The appearance of zombie, broke the quiet life, the only way is to eliminate them! Watch your bullet count Killing a single zombie will make it easy for you to complete the task, but surrounded by zombies will kill you

name: Danger: Electric Shock
description: A simple action puzzle game. Carry the rod to the finish line while avoiding the dangerous traps!!

name: Kingdom of Assetia: The Clicker Game
description: In Kingdom of Assetia: The Clicker Game you'll be assuming the role of the Mayor of Anywhere. After a disastrous flood hit the former prime adventuring hub you'll be working on restoring the village.

name: Hidden Object: Detective Holmes - Heirloom
description: Arthur Conan Doyle's detectives are conducting a new investigation! Train your brain with the best classic hidden object detective game!

name: Above the Skies
description: Dylan is the head of a small village and captain of The Eagle and he takes it upon himself to find The Grail and stop the Falls, saving those he cares for. The journey will be long and perilous, but the whole world above the skies depends on it.

name: Pixasso 3
description: "PIXASSO 3" - is a final chapter of relaxing franchise for lovers of the coloring pixel art. New game mode! New colors! New pictures! Have fun!

name: Tengin Music Engine
description: Tengin Music Engine is a psychedelic rhythm shooter that uses AI to adapt to any song. Designed to induce a trance-like state and get you totally in the zone, this free FPS has online co-op multiplayer and is perfect for training your aim, exploring new music, or simply vibing out.

name: YuuYuu Jiteki no Yuukarin
description: The story of Yuuka Kazami, the flower master of the four seasons who loves "flowers" more than anyone else in the world. A game that seems easy? A game that looks kind? Don't be fooled by the appearance. Please enjoy the world of adventure that becomes harsh as you progress to the end.

name: Fake Hostel
description: Fake Hostel this is exciting, puzzle game with Fancy Girls. Control your tube and find the way to pass the level and unlock a lot of beauty in the gallery

name: The Cruel kings
description: The Cruel kings is a top-down game in which you must either kill or survive. Each round starts with a split screen. The goal of the players is to destroy each other in 1 minute. There are also coins. If the players have an equal amount of life, then the one who collected the most coins wins.

name: Robosnow
description: Robosnow is a casual racing game. Collect bonuses to increase your speed. Challenge yourself in a new personal record time with precise turns and obstacle avoidance.

name: Puzzle Fever
description: Puzzle fever - Endless game for puzzle lovers! Place figures on the playing field to fill in lines and get coins and points for successful combinations, use bonuses in difficult situations and conquer point records!

name: Theatre of War
description: Engage your opponent in this unique real-time strategy game set on a surreal tile-based board game battlefield. Clash swords and fire arrows in the Medieval style, roll tanks to victory in the Great War setting, and gain air superiority in the Contemporary mode.

name: Vazial Saga XX
description: Brainwash the fools, exploit taxes, strengthen your armaments, prosper your descendants, and conquer the world!

name: Food Delivery Battle
description: Hello, drivers! Have you ever wanted to play a game with your own original character? Well, “Food Delivery Battle” is your answer. “Food Delivery Battle” is a delivery game that is compatible with VRoidHub.

name: Neutron and the Tri-Spark
description: Neutron is an action maze runner where you will guide our hero on an adventure to collect the energy orbs of the Tri-Spark while avoiding capture by the security bots.

name: Two Hundred Ways
description: 200 tricky levels to solve in Two Hundred Ways. The goal is to make the ball(s) reach its goal(s). That will be hard because of up to three layers and a lot of traps. To finish the levels, you have some resources but only a limited budget. Think outside the box to have benefits.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Autumn 2021
description: Puzzles about Autumn!

name: Fantasy Sliding Puzzle
description: Challenging sliding puzzles with various levels of difficulty, featuring epic fantasy female characters.

name: 1001 Jigsaw Detective
description: Reveal fantastic secrets with 1001 Jigsaw Detective. 500 detective puzzles!

name: Connect
description: A casual indie puzzle game in which you rotate hexagonal tiles in order to complete and connect all the pieces on the board.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Tuwhena Volcano
description: What if you could ride a Roller Coaster just like the ones in Roller Coasters' Parks from real life in the middle of a Volcano? Yeah, that is Tuwhena Volcano. Epic Roller Coasters is a game with themed and realistic roller coasters with three different modes: casual, race and shooter.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Great Canyon
description: What adventure can I go in a canyon? In a hang glider? On a speedboat? No, on a roller coaster!

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Snow Land
description: Snow land roller coaster for Epic Roller Coasters.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Wyvern Siege
description: Wyvern Siege is a medieval ride for Epic Roller Coasters!Here you'll take a ride between warriors fighting and dragons spreading fire!

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Haunted Castle
description: A classic ride on a ghost train. Epic Roller Coasters is a game with themed and realistic roller coasters with three different modes: casual, race and shooter. You can choose companions to go with on the rides and even take selfies and photos to share on social medias. It is fun for the whole family and friends!

name: Epic Roller Coasters: T-Rex Kingdom
description: T-Rex Kingdom is a ride for Epic Roller Coasters between the Age of Dinosaurs.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Armageddon
description: Post-apocalyptic ride for Epic Roller Coasters.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Neon Rider
description: Neon Rider is a Sci-fi theme ride for Epic Roller Coasters.Start with a handmade cinematic between robots that just became evil and go straight forward in a roller coaster throughout a futuristic city in a raining day!

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Twilight
description: Try this crazy and fast ride in the twilight. Epic Roller Coasters is a game with themed and realistic roller coasters with three different modes: casual, race and shooter. You can choose companions to go with on the rides and even take selfies and photos to share on social medias. It is fun for the whole family and friends!

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Oasis
description: Usually an Oasis is a place to relax... But, we managed to change that.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Lost Forest
description: Lost Forest is a action ride for Epic Roller Coasters.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: North Pole
description: The place where christmas is all year. Epic Roller Coasters is a game with themed and realistic roller coasters with three different modes: casual, race and shooter. You can choose companions to go with on the rides and even take selfies and photos to share on social medias. It is fun for the whole family and friends!

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Halloween
description: Halloween roller coaster for Epic Roller Coasters.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Dread Blood
description: Dread Blood is a horror ride for Epic Roller Coasters.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Space Station
description: Find out if the B4T astronauts can fix the space station.

name: Go! Go! Nippon! 2015
description: A standalone expansion of Go! Go! Nippon! that nearly doubles the content of the original game––adding new locations like Tokyo Skytree, Odaiba, Comiket, and more! The expansion renders the game in 720p widescreen format, with both new and old CGs in the new aspect ratio.

name: Kuubo Senki
description: Sin descripción

name: Kaijuu Senki
description: Sin descripción

name: Go! Go! Nippon! 2016
description:
A new standalone expansion of Go! Go! Nippon! that includes 50% more content, including new sightseeing locations and love interest events.

New shitamachi locations and historical Japanese gardens have also been added for those who want a greater taste of traditional Japan, as well as new types of scenes such as Japanese culture workshops. An improved "wallet" system has been added to help you keep track of things you've bought, adding a new layer of realism to the sightseeing experience!

name: Elder Gate
description: Sin descripción

name: Minton Keibu no Sousa File Doukeshi Satsujin Jiken
description: A summer resort town Brighton stands not far from London, with a small circus troupe becomes the main attraction of the season. Just a day before the premiere clown Charles Dubois is found dead in a shower wagon, the cause of death is a knife strike from the back. Star as the detective who is called from London to resolve this case.

name: Clannad Key Trilogy Premium Box
description: A collection of visual novels developed by Key for the Playstation 2.

name: Clannad: Lost Winter
description: A fan-made kinetic novel based on Key/VisualArts' CLANNAD, continuing Ushio's path.

name: A Time of Life
description: A short ~5 minute romance Visyal novel set in the Rebuild of Evangelion universe, "A Time of Life" helps bridge a critical divide between Evangelion 2.22 You Can (Not) Advance and Evangelion 3.33 You Can (Not) Redo. Told from the perspective of Mari Illustrious Makinami.

name: Marry Me, Misato!
description: You are the hero, whose only love is Misato decides to marry her. But it's obvious - she is an anime character, how can you marry her then? However, your love is so strong... And you have a plan...

name: A Curious Pastime
description: You are a young person of the Fir Cruthen, the mightiest (and drunkenest) nation of the Warhost. You've ventured forth to join the Warhost and make a mighty name for yourself. You'll do this by completing an increasingly arbitrary, never ending, serious of inane puzzles; given to you by a colourful cast of characters doing terrible Scottish accents. Will you be able to rise above the status of Background Noob and earn a name for yourself? Unlikely, you'll probably be dead before the weekend's over.

name: Bustin' the Bastille
description:
The year is 1789. Anger is simmering and people take the street, they protest against the priviliges of the nobility and the clergy. The revolution is coming. It will bring liberty, fraternity, equality, and lots and lots of beheadings!
And unbeknownst to her, a fishmonger with a mid-life crisis finds herself in the middle of it all.

name: Absurdistan
description:
Absurdistan is a partially text-based, side-scrolling adventure game featuring simplistic graphics.

You play as Leszek, a young Absurdani, who, just like his family, is fed up with the regime imposed by the Party. But, dear Adventure Gamer, fear nothing! Despite the seemingly gloomy setting, the game doesn't intend to get you down, as its main goal is to poke fun at many absurdities of the daily life in a totalitarian-communist state.

The game features a whole variety of puzzles, which, unlike the state of Absurdistan, do make sense. Some of them may even require you to grab something to write and figure them out in real life.

name: Castle
description: "Castle" is an adventure game in which you are exploring a mysterious castle and its surroundings and are trying to figure out what really had happened. Before you start, you need to select one out of four individuals you will be guiding through this adventure. You may choose between a fighter, a magician, a thief and a priest. Each of them has different characteristics' values like power, intelligence and skills. Walking around the place you may collect objects and interact with the scenery using set of command icons such as examine, pick up, put down, give, talk and attack. Movement is done using the direction icon in which you choose what direction you would like to take next. The game consists of 70 different locations to explore.

name: My Best Nightmare
description: The quest with psychological horror elements, nice pixel art, and a non-linear story.

name: 断刀客
description: Sin descripción

name: Tux and Fanny
description: Tux and Fanny just want to play soccer but their soccer ball is deflated. Go on an epic adventure to help them inflate their ball. Play as both Tux and Fanny as well as a cat and a flea. All four characters will have to work together if you're going to inflate the ball.

name: Beat Them All
description: Beat Them All is the ultimate Beat'em Up game. The whole game is designed in a story mode where you will fight against the thugs of city by applying your Boxing and Kung Fu skills. Includes a training mode to help your learn all techniques you will need to progress throughout the game. Clean the city now!

name: Ball Physics Draw Puzzles
description: Ball Physics Draw Puzzles is a simple and a fun puzzle game with the goal to guide all balls into a cup just by drawing paths on the screen. Draw Shapes with physical forces act to them and complete challenging puzzles.

name: Momolu and Friends
description: The story follows Momolu, a gentle, unassuming panda who has a knack of stumbling into situations requiring his help. Momolu’s friends experience their own set of everyday problems which are solved through creative thinking and collaboration: Bani the rabbit helps redecorate the harbour with her sketchbook, Huhu the owl wants to build a slide that everyone can enjoy Hiko the badger gets to the bottom of a water mystery! Momolu helps the other animals find solutions to their challenges by encouraging them to use their own skills and strengths. By working together the animals discover, learn, make mistakes, have tons of fun, and always learn something about design along the way. Momolu and Friends is a great game for your Kids! Hours of fun and educational activities and videos!

name: Forty Thieves Solitaire Collection
description: Do you love Forty Thieves Solitaire (also known as "Napoleon at St Helena" or "Big Forty"), but want a bigger challenge? Now you can play Forty Thieves Solitaire and other popular variants with different levels of difficulty.

name: Cave of Avarice
description: A former Dahomey Amazon turned mercenary has been hired by two explorers for leading them to a cave said to contain a great treasure. The mercenary has been tasked with guarding the entrance while the two explorers enter, but as gunshots are heard from within only to be followed by silence, the mercenary chooses to investigate...

name: Casino Roulette Royal
description: Feel lucky today! Now, you can play Casino Roulette Royal anywhere and anytime. Bet without spending money, and enjoy a unique experience! If you are a fan of casino table games, you will love our Roulette. Today, luck is on your side. Develop a good strategy and achieve victory! Become a professional real Roulette blitz player by betting just like in other casino table games without risking your real money!

name: Centipede: Recharged
description: The original bug-blasting arcade game is back! Centipede: Recharged has been reimagined for modern gameplay, with vibrant visuals designed for modern screens, a 16:9 field of play, and an original soundtrack from award-winning video game composer Megan McDuffee. Aim for a high score in the old school arcade mode and earn bragging rights with your name at the top of the leaderboard. Or test your skills and rank on the boards in one of 30 intensely creative challenges, which twist the gameplay in new and exciting ways. A dozen new power-ups can give you an edge by introducing abilities like screen-clearing explosions, rail guns, and even slowing down time. Every mode and level is playable in local co-op mode with a friend.

name: Wild Pinball Bundle
description: Enjoy 3 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. Discover all the secrets, in these thrilling games, dinosaurs, lions, elephants and sharks awaits you. Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: Hard West: Ultimate Edition
description: Welcome to the Wild West as you've never seen before. Follow Warren on his descent into the darkest recesses of the human soul, and try to survive in a world full of hard choices and even harder consequences. Because in this world, death is a constant presence and the black pacts which you make with forces beyond human comprehension will forever haunt all those around you.

name: Kitaria Fables: Deluxe Edition
description: Kitaria Fables is a delightfully cute action adventure RPG with farming and crafting! Armed with a sword, bow and spellbook, fight back against a rising darkness threatening the world. Discover diverse regions in search of relics and resources, tend to your farm to grow your own provisions, and take on quests solo or with a friend in local co-op mode!

name: The Medium + Observer: System Redux + Darq: Complete Edition Bundle
description: The Ultimate Horror Bundle. Use your psychic abilities to uncover the disturbing secrets of The Medium, become a neural police detective in the dark cyberpunk world of Observer: System Redux, and bend gravity inside the lucid nightmares of DARQ: Complete Edition.

name: Digerati Couch Co-op Vol. 2
description: It's time to get cosy with your best bud again for another round of unmissable co-op action. This bundle contains the following games, all of which feature local/couch co-op (as well as single-player modes):

name: Surgeon Simulator 2 Launch Bundle
description: It's time to ‘scrub in' solo or jump into 4 player online games in this physics-based surgery sim with ludicrous coop and competitive play, plus an awesome builder mode. Unearth the mysteries of the Bossa Labs Medical Facility and save Bob's life. Get ready to team up for trauma!

name: Imaginary Realms Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:
- Endless Fables 4: Shadow Within
- My Brother Rabbit
- Dreamwalker: Never Fall Asleep
